text: aur ve tumase anaathon ke vishay mein poochhate hai. kaho, "unake sudhaar kee jo reeti apanaee jae achchhee hai. aur yadi tum unhen apane saath sammilit kar lo to ve tumhaare bhaee-bandhu hee hain. aur allaah bigaad paida karanevaale ko bachaav paida karanevaale se alag pahachaanata hai. aur yadi allaah chaahata to tumako zahamat (kathinaee) mein daal deta. nissandeh allaah prabhutvashaalee, tatvadarshee hai.
